short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to share encrypted data using your private and public keys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables users to encrypt large files that will be shared. It enables the user to add their own public and private keys. In this way, you can encrypt a file using a recipient's public key. So the recipient can decrypt with their private key.
